name: Veteran Captain
description: When you reveal a command, you may discard this card to gain 1 command token of your choice.

name: Weapons Liaison
description: Before you reveal a command, you may spend 1 command token to change that command to a <concentrateFire/> or <squadron/> command.

name: Defense Liaison
description: Before you reveal a command, you may spend 1 command token to change that command to a <navigate/> or <engineering/> command.

name: Support Officer
description: At the start of the Command Phase, you may discard this card to discard all of your command dials.

name: Navigation Officer
description: Before you reveal a command, you may chnage that command to a <navigate/> command.

name: Wing Commander
description: Before you reveal a command, you may chnage that command to a <squadron/> command.

name: Tactical Expert
description: Before you reveal a command, you may chnage that command to a <concentrateFire/> command.

name: Engineering Captain
description: Before you reveal a command, you may chnage that command to a <engineering/> command.

name: Intel Officer
description: While attacking, after you roll your attack pool, you may exhaust this card to choose 1 defense token. If that token is spent during this attack, discard that token.

name: Leia Organa
description: When you reveal a command, you may choose another friendly ship at distance 1-5 and change that ship's top command to your revealed command.

name: Lando Calrissian
description: While defending, during the Spend Defense tokens Step, you may discard this card to force the attacker to reroll 1 or more dice of your choice.

name: Walex Blissex
description: When you activate, you may discard this card to recover 1 of your discarded defense tokens.

name: Raymus Antilles
description: When you reveal a command, you may gain 1 matching command token without spending the command dial.

name: Adar Tallon
description: After you resolve a <squadron/> command, exhaust this card to toggle the activation slider of 1 squadron activated with that command.

name: Captain Needa
description: At the start of the first round, you may replace 1 of your defense tokens with an <evade/> defense token.

name: Director Isard
description: When you reveal a command, you may look at all command dials assigned to 1 enemy ship.

name: Admiral Montferrat
description:
While defending against a ship, if your speed is 3 or higher, the attack is treated as obstructed.
After you execute a maneuver, if you overlapped a ship, discard this card.

name: Flight Controllers
description: <squadron/>: the anti-squadron armament of each squadron that you activate is increased by 1 blue die until the end of its activation.

name: Wulff Yularen
description: When you spend a command token, you may exhaust this card to gain 1 command token of the same type.

name: Admiral Chiraneau
description: <squadron/> Squadrons that you activate can move even if they are engaged. When an engaged suqadron moves in this way, treat it as having a printed speed of "2.

name: Ordnance Experts
description: While attacking, you may reroll any number of your black dice.

name: Ruthless Strategists
description: After attacking a squadron, you may deal 1 damage to a friendly squadron engaged with the defender. If you do, the defender suffers 1 damage.

name: Sensor Team
description: While attacking, you may exhaust this card and spend 1 die to change 1 of your dice to a face with an <accuracy/> icon.

name: Gunnery Team
description: You can attack from the same hull zone more than once per activation. That hull zone cannot target the same ship or squadron more than once during that activation.

name: Nav Team
description: <navigate/>: Your <navigate/> tokens can either change your speed or increase 1 yaw value by 1.

name: Engineering Team
description: <engineering/>: Gain 1 aditional engineering point.

name: Projection Experts
description: <engineering/>: You may spend up to 2 engineering points to move that many shields from your ship to a friendly ship at distance 1-5.

name: Engine Techs
description: <navigate/>: After you execute a maneuver, you may exhaust this card to execute a 1-speed maneuver.

name: Boosted Comms
description: <squadron/>: You can activate friendly squadrons at close-long range instead of close-medium.

name: Expanded Hangar Bay
description: You squadron value is increased by 1.

name: Point-Defense Reroute
description: While attacking a squadron at close range, you may reroll your <critical/> icons.

name: Quad Laser Turrets
description: While defending at distance 1, if the attacker is a squadron, you have <b>COUNTER 1<b/>.

name: Phylon Q7 Tractor Beams
description: when you activate, you may exhaust this card to choose 1 enemy ship of your size class or smaller at distance 1-5. That ship must spend a <navigate/> token or reduce its speed by 1 to a minimum of 1.

name: Cluster Bombs
description: After a squadron perfoms an attack against you, even if you are destroyed, you may discard this card to roll 4 blue dice. That squadron suffers 1 damage for each <damage/> or <critical/> icon rolled.

name: Advanced Projectors
description: When you resolve the <redirect/> token effect, you can choose more than one hull zone to suffer damage, which may include a nonadjacent hull zone.

name: Electronic Countermeasures
description: While defending, you may exhaust this card to spend 1 defense token that your opponent targeted with an <accuracy/> result.

name: Redundant Shields
description: At the start of each Status Phase, you may recover 1 shield.

name: XX-9 Turbolasers
description: <critical/>: The first 2 damage cards dealt to the defender by this attack are dealt faceup.

name: Heavy Turbolaser Turrets
description: While attacking, the <brace/> deffense effect cannot reduce the damage total by more than 1 unless it is the only defense token spend by the defender during the attack.

name: Slaved Turrets
description:
You cannot attack more than once per round.
While attacking a ship, add 1 red die to your attack pool.

name: X17 Turbolasers
description: While attacking, if the defender spends a <redirect/> token, it cannot suffer more than 1 damage on hull zones other than the defending hull zone.

name: Turbolaser Reroute Circuits
description: While attacking, you may spend 1 <evade/> defense token to change 1 red die to a face with a <critical/> icon or 2 <damage/> icons.

name: H9 Turbolasers
description: While attacking, you may change 1 die face with a <damage/> or <critical/> icon to a face with an <accuracy/> icon.

name: Enhanced Armament
description: the battery armaments for your left and right hull zones are increased by 1 red die.

name: Leading Shots
description: While attacking, you may spend 1 blue die to reroll any number of dice in your attack pool.

name: Ion Cannon Batteries
description: BLUE : Choose and discard 1 command token from the defender. If the defender does not have any command tokens, the defending hull zone loses 1 shield instead.

name: SW-7 Ion Batteries
description: While attacking a ship, each of your unspent <accuracy/> icons adds 1 damage to the damage total.

name: Overload Pulse
description: BLUE : Exhaust all of the defender's defense tokens.

name: NK-7 Ion Cannons
description: BLUE : You may exhaust this card to force the defender to choose and discard 1 of his defense tokens.

name: Assault Proton Torpedoes
description: BLACK : Deal 1 faceup damage card to the defender.

name: Assault Concussion Missiles
description: BLACK : Each hull zones adjacent to the defending hull zone suffers 1 damage.

name: Rapid Reload
description: the battery armaments for your left and right hull zones are increased by 1 black die.

name: Expanded Launchers
description: The battery armament for your front hull zone is increased by 2 black dice.
